entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
